metadata.synopsis: You speak to the hag at the end of the game, right before you go into the boss fight. She's there to support the player and aid them in the fight.

0.speaker: Auntie Ethel
0.text: Can't stay away from me, petal? I don't blame you. But you've got a battle to win, and you won't do it looking at me with the coaxing eyes of a dying calf.
0.context: NodeContext: ethel has shown up to support the player in the final fight. Eager for a bloody fight!

1.speaker: Auntie Ethel
1.text: See - I showed up, didn't I? Auntie Ethel keeps her word. Now slap on your gladrags and put on a show, petal. It's time for blood!
1.context: NodeContext: ethel has shown up to support the player in the final fight. Eager for a bloody fight!
